lead_paragraph: Napoli beat Sassuolo, 2-0, at home to move within 3 points of second-place Roma in Serie A. Duvan Zapata and Marek Hamsik combined for the goals.

headline.main: Napoli Makes Headway in Serie A
headline.print_headline: Napoli Makes Headway in Serie A

snippet: Napoli beat Sassuolo, 2-0, at home to move within 3 points of second-place Roma in Serie A. Duvan Zapata and Marek Hamsik combined for the goals.
